channel.title: Emote Tab Help

item.title: Emote Tab Help
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

the one with musicmad441, the customcommand(“cather”))
That is what changes the name of the emote on emotes…Just change it to skillcape or cape. etc
After that…just put

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skillcape") && playerRights >= 0) { capeEmote(); }

With your other commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote Tab Help
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

Ok I want this to be on one of the emote tabs but I would hav to delete one of the existing emote things and I have decided to replace this:

if (command.startsWith("skillcape")) { capeEmote(); }

With this:

customCommand("cather"); //made by Musicmad441 } break; case 171: if(teleblock == true){ //Made by musicmad441 sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else

And what I mean by that is I want to get rid of that and replace it with my skillcape emote command. Any help is appreciated.

Read full topic
